archdesc.bioghist: Professor of biological chemistry at the University of Michigan.
archdesc.scopecontent: Paper entitled "The Department of Biological Chemistry, 1922-1955" containing a yearly summary of departmental activities and staff changes, lists of masters students, and sketches of all doctoral students including their present activities; and correspondence containing biographical information on doctoral graduates of the department.
